content: Useless. Plays effects only while app is open. Plays sound effects (!?) on the phone that cannot be turned off.

Worth it

content: Doesn't function well...the last update was 2016 so I get a warning everytime I open that it needs an update to work with newer android versions. I'm very disappointed.

great for the 4th I have used this app on the 4th of July for two years now and love it. My kids and neighbors always ask how I get my outside lights to look like fireworks. The auto play makes it easy to keep it going without worry . it's To bad hues doesn't offer these kind of features natively. one request. after light affect, lights stay on, I would like to have option lights to go off until next affect during auto play.

I paid 2 dollars for the app today expecting to see the ball drop in sync with my lights and it was about 1 minute 30 seconds off. so i feel like i paid 2 dollars for nothing. it was a let down. the other features work good though. jjdt not in sync with the ball dropping and it was very upsetting for me.
It's a really bad app, not worth downloading

payed for this app, but the app is unable to find any hue lights and also

Was not in sync to the ball drop

Cool way to freak out people. Big issue I have is each time I open the app to use it the app tells me I need to tap the hue base, which is annoying is hell and I refuse to keep doing it so please fix this
Totally mesmerized!

Works alright on a day to day basis but utter, complete fail for the ball drop on NYE. App stated midnight had already happened when it was 4 minutes away. Second year in a row ball drop sync failed. I tested and previewed several times before but complete mess on NYE.
replyContent:
Hello Troy,

The Ball Drop uses the device time. Could it be that the phone's time was offset a couple of minutes compared to the TV-time?

BR, Stefan

content: I decide to have some fireworks. Kinda slow and laggy, but no big deal. I go to the normal hue app to get regular lights again and suddenly it completely resets the app and I have to set everything up again. Used to be really good. Lately though...
replyContent:
No we do not change anything on the normal Hue app. The Hue app show the current color of the lights.

So yes the app changes the color of your lights, you need to hit 'Auto play' again to disable it, it is a toggle button.

If you just switch to another app, it will keep changing the color of your lights, that is by design!

BR, Stefan

content: Great fun app. Totally love it.

Works like it should .. I've had no issues connecting, sounds great though a good Bluetooth  speaker.. but i fill it lacks a bit in performace. I have about 30 bulbs and lights strip all together  when I use it for 4th of july..(Fireworks are banned this year) I fill it should be more active with all the bulbs you set.. it seems to just pick a few.. the 1000 fire cracker works awsome...
Was hoping I could hit play and it would just do its thing.  Instead you have to push the button every time to get a firework.  Also, there should be a grand finale button.
replyContent:
Hello Justin, 

What you were hoping for is present in the app. 
You should enable the 'Auto play', it is the second button on the bottom of the app. Please also checkout the help page for all details about the app.

Best Regards, Stefan

content: Super zabawa. A dzieciaki to mają radochę!

I really enjoyed all the special effects and fireworks.  I would like to see some 4th of July themed effects as well, even though I realize that is an American holiday and this app is trying to appeal to the world but some patriotic effects might go nice with this app.  Also, was hoping for a package with all 5 apps for a discounted price so I could try them all, but I don't know if I want to spend that much. Great app for hue ...

Latest update significantly improved timing and effects. Excellent update! To the dev: can you set it so that after an effect has been run, the bulb returns to its previous state? Loving it otherwise.
replyContent: Added as an option to the user request list. We might implement this in a future release. When activating one of the mood buttons, the light will change in a halloween like mood.

content: Of all the sound boards, this is my favorite. The firework effects are just plain fun.
My little kids love it.  they danced to the the music as the fireworks went off.  It was fun for the kids.  Thank you.

Should be free.  Poor audio, not enough actual light flickering.  Should be synced to audio and have some patriotic audio selections.

content: Not bad... But there is no off. You have to close the app, then go into main hue program to turn lights off. Also, after running this app, it puts some lights in a strange state... Resulting in having to turn the lights off/on/off multiple times to shut off the rogue light(s).
replyContent:
Hello Don, the 'Auto Play' but also the 'Mood' buttons, are toggle buttons.
If you hit them again it should stop playing.

A single fx (upper buttons) will keep playing until finished, but they don't 
take that long to finish, hope this helps?
